page.title: 01The Hellesdon Area
page.content: The area is bounded by Upper Hellesdon in S, Old Catton to E, outskirts of Spixworth to NE and Horsham St Faiths village in NW. Most of Upper Hellesdon is residential with the suburban ribbon development typical of the 50's/60's,a large part of which is bungalows.Many of them have loft conversions to increase the accomodation for young families.Old Catton village has a distinctive centre with the church of St.Margarets and older buildings like Catton Hall. The airport with the industrial estate covers about one-third of the total region.There is a considerable amount of arable farming around the villages of Horsham and Spixworth.The main A140 Norwich to Cromer road runs NW-SE through the area. Hellesdon's population is estimated at 15000, and there is little room for expansion!
